text: Rives-du-Fougerais is a commune. It is in Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in west France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2024 and consists of the former communes of Thouarsais-Bouildroux (the seat), Cezais and Saint-Sulpice-en-Pareds. == References == Category:2024 establishments in Europe Category:2020s establishments in France Category:Communes in Vendée
title: Rives-du-Fougerais
